definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: burn, scorch, brand (NH id.; Aram. kho0 esp. Pa.; Ar. kaway cauterize)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּכָּוֶה]] Is 43:2 thou shalt not be scorched (fig. of Isr., ‖[[בָּעַר]]); 3 fpl. [[וְרַגְלָיו לאׁ תִּכָּוֶי֑נׇה]] Pr 6:28 shall a man walk on the coals and his feet not be burned ? (‖[[שָׂרַף]] of garments v:Pr 6:27).
